sourcesContent:
import Counter from './counter' import { ethers } from 'ethers' import abi from 'erc-20-abi' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { formatUnits } from '@ethersproject/units' export default function Vault() { const [balance, setBalance] = useState(0) const [token, setToken] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum) const address = '0x25f8087ead173b73d6e8b84329989a8eea16cf73' const erc20_rw = address ? new ethers.Contract(address, abi, provider) : null async function getTokenData() { setBalance( await erc20_rw.balanceOf(address).then((res) => { return parseFloat(formatUnits(res._hex)).toFixed(2) }) ) setToken(await erc20_rw.symbol()) } if (address) { getTokenData() } }) return (

Yield Guild Prize Pool

available: {balance}

YGG

available: {balance}

YGG

) }
